In England, in the seven days to 05 November, there were 24,127 new confirmed cases (42.7 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 29 October, there were 32,654 new cases, and so the new cases have decreased by 26% (8,527 fewer cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 10 November is 20,228,010 (35,770 cases per 100,000 population).
